lyrics.stanza: Oh, the heavens declare, yes, the heavens declare. When we look—God's glory is there! (look and see it!) The expanse shows forth the work of His hands And declares God's glory to man.
Day by day there is speech, Night by night knowledge tells, But no language or voice is heard; Their line has gone forth to all of the earth Their words to the end of the world!
